    @allure.story("资源甘特图-工作面板显示内容")
    # @pytest.mark.run(order=1)
    def test_resourcechart_work(self, login_to_chart):
        driver = login_to_chart  # WebDriver 实例
        chart = ChartPage(driver)  # 用 driver 初始化 ChartPage
        chart.click_button('//a[@title="设置"]')
        chart.click_button('(//div[text()=" 资源甘特图 "])[2]')
        chart.click_button(
            '//label[text()="工作面板显示内容"]/following-sibling::div//i'
        )
        chart.click_button('//div[text()=" 标准登录 "]')
        ele = chart.get_find_element_xpath('//span[text()="副资源(S0)"]')
        action = ActionChains(driver)
        action.double_click(ele)
        action.perform()
        chart.click_button('(//button[@class="ivu-btn ivu-btn-primary"])[4]')
        chart.wait_for_el_loading_mask()
        ele = chart.get_find_element_xpath(
            '//label[text()="工作面板显示内容"]/following-sibling::div//input'
        )
        print(ele.get_attribute("value"))
>       assert (
            "ME.Operation.ProductionTask.UseInstructions['S0'].Resource"
            in ele.get_attribute("value")
        )
E       assert "ME.Operation.ProductionTask.UseInstructions['S0'].Resource" in "'订单代码：'+ME.Operation.Code+'\\n产品代码：'+ME.Order.Item.Code+'\\n订单交期：'+ME.Order.LET +'\\n订单优先度：'+ME.Order.Priority +'\\n工作代码：'+ME.Operation.Code+'\\n工作数量：'+ME.Operation.OperationOutMainItemQty+'\\n计划开始时刻：'+ME.Operation.OperationProductionStartTime+'\\n计划结束时刻：'+ME.Operation.OperationProductionEndTime"
E        +  where "'订单代码：'+ME.Operation.Code+'\\n产品代码：'+ME.Order.Item.Code+'\\n订单交期：'+ME.Order.LET +'\\n订单优先度：'+ME.Order.Priority +'\\n工作代码：'+ME.Operation.Code+'\\n工作数量：'+ME.Operation.OperationOutMainItemQty+'\\n计划开始时刻：'+ME.Operation.OperationProductionStartTime+'\\n计划结束时刻：'+ME.Operation.OperationProductionEndTime" = get_attribute('value')
